ModMetaData.name: Outfitter 0.19.0
ModMetaData.author: Ara
ModMetaData.description:
Allows pawns to factor in all kinds of gear stat offsets other than just armor. - Defaults to sensible priorities based on work types assigned and map seasonal temperatures. - Allows you to finetune, add and/or remove priorities. - Takes personal traits like temperature preference or mental states into account. - No naked pawns!
Original version of 'Outfitter™' by Fluffy. Original version of 'AutoEquip™' by soulkata. This is a fusion of both mods. B18, A17, A16 and A15 versions by Killface. Updated to B19 by Araelle.
DISCLAIMER: I am not a C# expert! in fact i just picked it up to update this mod. It is provided AS IS. I will try my best to support it, but don't expect miracles.
Please report bugs, compatibility issues and so on.
Also, if someone knows how to put multiple authors in the author list, i gladly accept any help.
